Class Character

java.lang.Object
  Character
Direct Known Subclasses:
EndGameCharacter, LosePointsCharacter, Monster
public class Character
extends Object

This class is part of the "Eternal Destiny" application. "Eternal Destiny" is a text based adventure game.

Version:
4.5.14
Author:
Andrea Siejna
